Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Post race skate. Trail was in perfect condition!Even enough snow to ski from club house to the woods

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be packed this morning. Classic track is in great shape.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The wind is up from the west this morning but is forecast to calm down during the day. The temperature is very comfortable and will stay right around freezing. The snow surface is machine groomed and is excellent thanks to the recent snowfall. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is "BBQ Soup" and it's worth the trip. Petoskey and Harbor Springs Middle Schools will host a ski meet on Birch Run this afternoon. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
